paper_abstract: The photoionization processes of excited hydrogen atoms in plasma environments are investigated using the method of complex coordinate rotation The standard Debye-Huckel model and modified Debye-Huckel model are adopted to describe the plasma screening effects The photoionization cross sections of plasma-embedded excited hydrogen atoms varied with different screening lengths are displayed to illustrate the influence of plasma screening The results of the Debye-Huckel model compared with the modified Debye-Huckel are presented The shape resonances and Cooper minima due to the plasma screening are observed and discussed (C) 2010 Elsevier B V All rights reserved
paper_title: The photoionization of excited hydrogen atom in plasmas
